channel.title: JBoss Issue Tracker
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [ENTESB-1375] cannot installing features in jboss fuse 6.1.0.redhat-378 using the quickstart jms
item.description:

item.summary: cannot installing features in jboss fuse 6.1.0.redhat-378 using the quickstart jms

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: As Gregorz said, this is already fixed in 379 with http://fusesource.com/forge/git/fuseenterprise.git/?p=fuseenterprise.git;a=commit;h=8396793829063fe6693809d56d401ca45ed02acf

customfieldvalues.customfieldvalue:
Verify etc/users.properties from the JBoss Fuse installation contains the following 'admin' user configured:
admin=admin,admin

copy src/main/resources/etc/org.fusesource.mq.fabric.cf-default.cfg to the etc/ directory

Change your working directory to jms directory from the quickstarts in the dist

Run mvn clean install to build the quickstart.

Start JBoss Fuse 6 by running bin/fuse

In the JBoss Fuse console, enter the following commands:

features:addurl mvn:org.jboss.quickstarts.fuse/jms/$

{project.version}

/xml/features

features:install quickstart-jms
